heisig_chinese_memo: A samurai is so minimal that they only buy food and never sell because they have so few possessions.
Ru_trainchinese: mài: (глаг) продавать; предавать; не жалеть усилий; хвастаться; зарабатывать на жизнь своим навыком
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the samurai (士) buys (買) then sells
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The resale value  of needles is pretty low.  You can buy it but you can't sell it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " out ", from " buy ", the original meaning is to exchange goods for money, as opposed to " buy ". "Shuowen": "Produce goods. Buy from the market." "Zuo Zhuan-Zhaogong 29th Year": "If the public is in charge, it is sold to the horse, but not to the horse."

" Selling " can mean betrayal. "Order of Mozi‧": "One person can be arrested for treason, sell the city, and pass the enemy over the city, and the two are killed by the order, and the four are from Chengdan."

" Selling " can also mean showing off or showing off. "Zhuangzi: Heaven and Earth": "Song of Duxian's mourning for selling fame in the world?"
humanum_short_description_en: From " out ", from " buy ", the original meaning is to exchange goods for money, as opposed to " buy ".
humanum_full_description:
從「出」，從「買」，本義為以貨物換錢，與「買」相對。《說文》：「出物貨也。从出从買。」 《左傳‧昭公二十九年》：「公執歸馬者賣之，乃不歸馬。」

　　「賣」可表示背叛。《墨子‧號令》：「能捕得謀反、賣城、踰城敵者一人，以令為除死罪二人，城旦四人。」

　　「賣」也可表示炫耀、賣弄。《莊子‧天地》：「獨弦哀歌以賣名聲於天下者乎？」
humanum_short_description: 從「出」，從「買」，本義為以貨物換錢，與「買」相對。

Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 買
Pictophonetic: 买 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 士 [ shì ] scholar, gentleman; soldier
    • 罒 [ wǎng ] net, network
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
①拿東西換錢，與“買”相對：賣菜。賣身。買賣。賣方。賣狗皮膏藥(喻說得好聽，實際上是騙人)。
②背叛祖國、親友或自己的良心：賣友，賣國求榮。賣身投靠。
③儘量使出力氣：賣力。賣命。賣勁兒。
④顯示自己，表現自己：賣弄。賣乖。倚老賣老。
⑤售銷買。
(Simplified: 卖)

Kanshudo mnemonic:the samurai (士) buys (買) then sells
Chinese: A samurai is so minimal that they only buy food and never sell because they have so few possessions.
Meaning: sell
Hanzi: 卖
Story: The resale value of needles is pretty low. You can buy it but you can't sell it.
Kind: traditional

從「 出 」，從「 買 」，本義為以貨物換錢，與「 買 」相對。《說文》：「出物貨也。从出从買。」 《左傳‧昭公二十九年》：「公執歸馬者賣之，乃不歸馬。」 「 賣 」可表示背叛。《墨子‧號令》：「能捕得謀反、賣城、踰城敵者一人，以令為除死罪二人，城旦四人。」 「 賣 」也可表示炫耀、賣弄。《莊子‧天地》：「獨弦哀歌以賣名聲於天下者乎？」
From " out", from " buy", the original meaning is to exchange goods for money, as opposed to " buy". "Shuowen": "Produce goods. Buy from the market." "Zuo Zhuan-Zhaogong 29th Year": "If the public is in charge, it is sold to the horse, but not to the horse." " Selling" can mean betrayal. "Order of Mozi‧": "One person can be arrested for treason, sell the city, and pass the enemy over the city, and the two are killed by the order, and the four are from Chengdan." " Selling" can also mean showing off or showing off. "Zhuangzi: Heaven and Earth": "Song of Duxian's mourning for selling fame in the world?"

賣字的基本解释

賣
mài
见“卖”。

賣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mài］
［《廣韻》莫懈切，去卦，明。］
“卖1”的繁体字。
(1)以货物换钱。与“買”相对。
(2)叛卖；出卖机密。
(3)炫耀；卖弄。
(4)尽量用出来，不吝惜。
(5)给予。
(6)方言。耍，扮。
(7)量词。旧时酒店、饭馆中称一份菜为一卖。

賣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1209第32
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫懈切，音邁。【說文】作?。出物貨也。从出从買。【註】徐鍇曰：貨精，故出則買之也。【九經字樣】隷省作賣。【周禮·天官·小宰】聽賣買以質劑。又【地官·司市】掌其賣儥之事。　又【集韻】莫駕切，音禡。【博雅】儥也。

賣字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
賣字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mài］
["Guangyun" is not slack in cutting, go to the hexagram, and clear. ]
Traditional characters for "卖1".
(1) Exchange goods for money. Contrary to "buy".
(2) Betrayal; betray secrets.
(3) Show off; show off.
(4) Use it as much as possible, and don't hesitate.
(5) Give.
(6) Dialects. Play, pretend.
(7) Quantifiers. In the old days, in hotels and restaurants, one dish was called one dish.
Sell

[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　 Sell; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1209 32
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Do not cut, sound step. [Said the text] For?. Goods are also produced. Buy from out. [Note] Xu Kai said: The goods are fine, so you can buy it when you sell it. 【Nine Classics】For sale in the province. [Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Xiao Zai】Listen to sell to buy quality agent. Also【Diguan·Sishi】handling his dying affairs.　[Jiyun] Do not cut, sound. [Bo Ya] Yan Ye.
